item.title: Fed's favored inflation gauge accelerates slightly in August
item.description: The Federal Reserve’s favored inflation gauge accelerated slightly in August from a year earlier

item.title: Thune says a shutdown can still be avoided if Democrats 'dial back' their demands
item.description: Senate Majority Leader John Thune is rejecting Democratic demands on health care as unserious but says a government shutdown is still “avoidable.”

item.title: Profit margin on flipping a home is at a 17-year low due to high prices
item.description: It pays less and less to buy and flip a home these days
